channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for VA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for VA

item.title: Report X-2024101855
item.description:
Report X-2024101855

Identified by scraper @ 2024-11-04T12:23:29+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-23
  • City: BRISTOL
  • State: VA
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: ONE AIR PACKAGE WAS FLAGGED BY SECURITY FOR AN INSPECTION. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED TWO INNER RETAIL PACKAGING BOXES CONTAINING DISPOSABLE VAPE CARTRIDGES WITH 5% NICOTINE WITHIN THOSE BOXES. THE VAPE CARTRIDGES ARE POWERED BY LITHIUM ION BATTERIES. THERE ARE A TOTAL OF TWENTY DISPOSABLE VAPE CARTRIDGES INSIDE THE BOX. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.

item.title: Report X-2024101787
item.description:
Report X-2024101787

Identified by scraper @ 2024-11-01T09:15:08+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-15
  • City: ROANOKE
  • State: VA
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: OPEN OUTER UNMARKED PACKAGE FOUND ON WORKTABLE AND WHEN INSPECTED THREE PACKAGED CYLINDERS OF UN1070 NITROUS OXIDE WERE DISCOVERED INSIDE IT. THE INNER PACKAGED CYLINDERS HAD DG LABELS OF CLASS 2, INHALATION HAZARD; CLASS 2.2 NON-FLAMMABLE GAS, AND CLASS 5.1 OXIDIZER. THE UNDECLARED HAZMAT SHIPMENT WAS CALLED INTO HMSC AND IS IN THE HOLD CAGE AWAITING FURTHER INSTRUCTIONS.
